email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I hope this email finds you well.

We are pleased to offer a freight rate of $75 per metric ton for the shipment of 5000MT of Wheat from Rotterdam to Shanghai under CFR terms. The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN STAR, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 300m. The laycan is set for October 10-15.

Please let us know if this works for you or if you have any specific requirements.

Best regards,
Alex Turner
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market rates. We are looking to secure a rate closer to $70 per metric ton. Additionally, could you confirm the demurrage rate and laytime details?

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Charterer Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for your response. Considering your feedback, we can adjust the rate to $72 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $12,000 per day, and the laytime is set at 5 days.

Please confirm if this revised rate and terms are acceptable.

Best regards,
Alex Turner
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can accept the rate of $72 per metric ton. Could you confirm the laycan dates and provide the vessel's ETA at Rotterdam?

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Charterer Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

The laycan remains October 10-15, and the vessel's ETA at Rotterdam is October 9. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on any changes.

Best regards,
Alex Turner
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Rotterdam to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for the confirmation. We are satisfied with the terms and look forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Charterer Logistics
